comment: Smart Data Models - GovGAST1 adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/GovGAST1/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Modified single shaft gas turbine.

contents.name: a
contents.comment: Turbine power time constant numerator scale factor (a).  Typical Value = 0.8. Default: 0.0

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: b
contents.comment: Turbine power time constant denominator scale factor (b).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: db1
contents.comment: Intentional dead-band width (db1).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: db2
contents.comment: Unintentional dead-band (db2).  Unit = MW.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: eps
contents.comment: Intentional db hysteresis (eps).  Unit = Hz.  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: fidle
contents.comment: Fuel flow at zero power output (Fidle).  Typical Value = 0.18. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv1
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 1, PU gv (Gv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv2
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 2,PU gv (Gv2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv3
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 3, PU gv (Gv3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv4
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 4, PU gv (Gv4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv5
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 5, PU gv (Gv5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: gv6
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 6, PU gv (Gv6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ka
contents.comment: Governor gain (Ka).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kt
contents.comment: Temperature limiter gain (Kt).  Typical Value = 3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: lmax
contents.comment: Ambient temperature load limit (Lmax).  Lmax is the turbine power output corresponding to the limiting exhaust gas temperature.  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: loadinc
contents.comment: Valve position change allowed at fast rate (Loadinc).  Typical Value = 0.05. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ltrate
contents.comment: Maximum long term fuel valve opening rate (Ltrate).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0.0

contents.name: mwbase
contents.comment: Base for power values (MWbase) (> 0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: pgv1
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 1, PU power (Pgv1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv2
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 2, PU power (Pgv2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv3
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 3, PU power (Pgv3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv4
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 4, PU power (Pgv4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv5
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 5, PU power (Pgv5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: pgv6
contents.comment: Nonlinear gain point 6, PU power (Pgv6).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: r
contents.comment: Permanent droop (R).  Typical Value = 0.04. Default: 0.0

contents.name: rmax
contents.comment: Maximum fuel valve opening rate (Rmax).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: t1
contents.comment: Governor mechanism time constant (T1).  T1 represents the natural valve positioning time constant of the governor for small disturbances, as seen when rate limiting is not in effect.  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: t2
contents.comment: Turbine power time constant (T2).  T2 represents delay due to internal energy storage of the gas turbine engine. T2 can be used to give a rough approximation to the delay associated with acceleration of the compressor spool of a multi-shaft engine, or with the compressibility of gas in the plenum of the free power turbine of an aero-derivative unit, for example.  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

contents.name: t3
contents.comment: Turbine exhaust temperature time constant (T3).  T3 represents delay in the exhaust temperature and load limiting system. Typical Value = 3. Default: 0

contents.name: t4
contents.comment: Governor lead time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: t5
contents.comment: Governor lag time constant (T5).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: tltr
contents.comment: Valve position averaging time constant (Tltr).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

contents.name: vmax
contents.comment: Maximum turbine power, PU of MWbase (Vmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vmin
contents.comment: Minimum turbine power, PU of MWbase (Vmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
